scenes.action_text: THE BODYGUARD Written by LAWRENCE KASDAN Clean Shooting Draft February 1992 FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY SCREEN IS BLACK In the darkness we hear dripping water, the echoing approach of two sets of footsteps. There is the sound of a sudden, quick scuffle, a heavy fall of bodies. THREE BOOMING GUNSHOTS. Two from one gun, one from another. So fast and close, they're barely distinguish- able. The sound of the SHOTS ECHOES against concrete walls and dies awa
